text: 擅长 is a very useful way of saying you are good at something. For example: 我擅长唱歌 – I am good at running.小明：彼得，你擅长什么运动？彼得：我比较擅长跑步。我可以跑完马拉松全程。因为跑步不需要其他器材，而且在跑步的过程中我还可以自己思考，或者听喜欢的音乐。这让我感觉很放松！还有啊，在室外跑步的时候，还可以呼吸新鲜的空气！你呢？小明：我擅长打乒乓球。我以前还获得过天津市乒乓球冠军。现在，我每周还都去体育馆打乒乓球。彼得：我感觉你们中国人都会打乒乓球，好厉害！小明：What sports are you good at, Peter?Peter：I’m quite good at running. I can complete a full marathon. Running doesn’t use other equipment and while I am running I can think or listen to music I like. This lets me feel very relaxed! Additionally, When I am running outdoors I can breathe fresh air. How about you?小明：I’m good at table tennis. In the past I was the table tennis champion of Beijing. Right now, I still go to the sports center every week to play table tennis.Peter：I think Chinese people are all able to play table tennis. It’s awesome!1 – 彼得擅长什么运动？a. 游泳b. 跑步c. 足球d. 乒乓球2 – 小明擅长什么运动？a. 游泳b. 跑步c. 足球d. 乒乓球1. b2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
